text: @realDonaldTrump You’ve lost control over the narrative. No evidence of “Antifa”-led protests, but plenty that your #coronavirus response has been a disaster. Stop demonizing those seeking justice and elected leaders who prioritize health. Racism and the pandemic aren’t going away by themselves.
